attributes.action: NHS staff to receive a bonus for their extra efforts and been absolute  heros
attributes.additional_details: I think that they should be rewarded by giving them a bonus as our appreciation to them. Most other sectors of business are getting the choice to leave work. To the NHS staff it's not an option.
attributes.background: I truly believe that all NHS staff from all sectors of the business that are bending over backwards and working all hours sent in this sad and uncertain time should receive a bonus gesture for all their extra hard work and efforts throughout this time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
